vulnerabilities.title: The AuthKit React Router Library rendered sensitive auth data in HTML
vulnerabilities.description:
In versions before `0.7.0`, `@workos-inc/authkit-react-router` exposed sensitive authentication artifacts â€” specifically `sealedSession` and `accessToken` by returning them from the `authkitLoader`. This caused them to be rendered into the browser HTML.

### Impact
This information disclosure could lead to session hijacking in environments where cross-site scripting (XSS), malicious browser extensions, or local inspection is possible.
 
### Patches
Patched in [https://github.com/workos/authkit-r
